events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: Capture when a new item is added to inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: Capture when an item is removed from inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: Capture when item details are updated in inventory.

events.name: InventoryStockChecked
events.description: Capture when inventory stock levels are checked.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Capture when a new item is added to inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Capture when an item is removed from inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Capture when item details are updated in inventory.

commands.name: CheckInventoryStock
commands.description: Capture when inventory stock levels are checked.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with supplier management system for real-time inventory updates.

integrationPoints.name: SalesManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with sales system to synchronize inventory levels after sales.

integrationPoints.name: OrderManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with order management system to manage order-related inventory adjustments.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with reporting service for inventory analytics.
